channel.title: Wood cutter

item.title: Wood cutter
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Sorry to sa ythis, but it is a bad script. clickmouse and movemousesmoothex will get you banned VERY fast. use mmouse(x,y,1,1) to move the mouse and mouse(x,y,1,1,true) will left click (or change the true to false and it will right click).

And use FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,treecolor,MSX1,MSY1,MSX2,MSY2,3) to find the tree because its more accurate and add a tolerance of 3 incase it doesnt find the exact color. Also, use failsafes, antiban, a dtm for the log nto a bitmap, and much more. I guess it is still a good start though.

Read full topic

item.title: Wood cutter
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ckc god_of_ckc
item.description:
@god_of_ckc wrote:

here program New; var x,y:integer; const treecolor=5210535;//color of tree treecolorInv=4419471;//color of tree in inventory TimeCut=3000; procedure cut; begin if(findcolor(x,y,treecolor,0,0,1000,1000))then wait(1000) movemousesmoothex(x,y,10,10,10,10,0) wait(1000) clickmouse(x,y,true) wait(TimeCut) end; procedure drop; begin if(findcolor(x,y,treecolorInv,0,0,500,500))then movemousesmoothex(x,y,10,10,10,10,0); clickmouse(x,y,false); end; begin repeat cut; drop; until false; end. [br][size=1]Posted on: April 09, 2007, 06:33:52 AM[/size][hr]i chopped it for ya =)

item.title: Wood cutter
item.dc:creator: @oblivian oblivian
item.description:
@oblivian wrote:

nvm about that lol heres the script anyway its got no randoms its my 2nd lol

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
{                    OBLIVIAN WOODCUTTER                            )
(                  WOOOOOOOOT my second script                   )
(                     hahahahahaha YA                            )
(                    thx to whiteVans s                          )
(               whiteVans is the bestst nicest                   )
(                     scripter EVER                              }
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////



program logcutter;
//////////////////////begin setup//////////////////////////////
const
treecolor=2245215;//color of tree
treecolorInv=2322780;//color of tree in inventory
TimeCut=20000;
/////////////////////end of setup///////////////////////////////
var
   drop,x,y:integer;
procedure cut;
 begin
  if(findcolor(x,y,treecolor,0,0,1000,1000))then
   wait(1000)
   movemousesmoothex(x,y,10,10,10,10,0)
  wait(1000)
 clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(TimeCut)
end;
procedure droplog;
  begin
   if(findcolor(x,y,treecolorInv,0,0,500,500))then
    movemousesmoothex(x,y,10,10,10,10,0);
  clickmouse(x,y,false);
 drop := BitmapFromString(33, 14, 'z78DA33300001371CC0604801' +
       '4C970F45BFE072F3D0F2CBC8F405F1F988D41C47490EA5DC17D43' +
       '593BCF4400B93477D31EA0BF2F22C792653EE86A1554E0EF5F6C3' +
       'A82F86A22F0043734223');
    if(findbitmap(drop,x,y))then
   movemousesmoothex(x,y,10,10,10,5,0)
clickmouse(x,y,true);
end;
 begin
  repeat
    cut;
   droplog;
 until false;
end.

Read full topic
